about_the_game:
A first-person psychological horror game where fear isn’t what you see but what you can’t escape.

Play through a fictional 90s horror film where the story unfolds through a series of puzzles, atmospheric exploration, and tense moments. 

Game Story

In the heart of Eastern Europe, a secret government facility known as Red Haven was nestled within a dense, fog-laden forest. Officially, it was a research center for studying rare blood diseases. Unofficially, it was the site of one of the most controversial experiments in modern history: Project CRE-8. 

Project CRE-8 aimed to unlock the secrets of immortality and harness supernatural abilities by studying the myths surrounding vampires. The team, led by Dr. Viktor Serov, a renowned hematologist and folklorist, believed that the legends of vampires might hold some basis in reality—perhaps an ancient pathogen or genetic anomaly. The goal was to isolate and harness whatever biological factor might grant enhanced strength, speed, and longevity.

The project was shrouded in secrecy, with a handpicked team of scientists, military personnel, and historians. They began their research by collecting samples from remote villages with a history of vampire legends. Outside of one of those villages was Site 17.

Key Features

  • Immersive Sound Design that makes every sound in the forest is a cause for concern.

  • Puzzle Solving mechanics that blend seamlessly into the horror atmosphere.

  • A Story-Driven Experience

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4 cores
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080 or AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: 4+ cores
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Above GeForce GTX 1080 or AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 11 GB available space

short_description: Experience a tense, first-person psychological horror where survival means facing the unknown. Unravel a chilling story of a secret government project through atmospheric exploration, and mind-bending puzzles.
